Properties.PropertyValue: SELECT [ost].[OST_Tracking_Report].ReportScheduleID, [ost].[OST_Report_Scheduler].ReportID, [ost].[OST_Tracking_Report].EmailDeliveryStatus FROM [ost].[OST_Tracking_Report] LEFT JOIN [ost].[OST_Report_Scheduler] ON [ost].[OST_Tracking_Report].ReportScheduleID = [ost].[OST_Report_Scheduler].ID where ReportScheduleID = reportIDfromAPI
